Author: liquidrock
Content:
Would highly recommend *not* overriding anything other than `CF_OnStoreSave`/`CF_OnStoreLoad`. The only way currently to get ModStorage support is to require Expansion-Core since ModStorage isn't enabled in CF. Then all you have to do is wrap them in `#ifdef EXPANSION_MODSTORAGE` .. `#endif`
Yes this will continue working if/when ModStorage ever gets enabled in CF, but at some point after that it would probably be a good idea to just swap that out with `#ifdef CF_MODSTORAGE` instead (or remove the ifdef wrapper entirely), so plan for that.
ModStorage documentation is here and does apply: https://github.com/Arkensor/DayZ-CommunityFramework/blob/production/docs/ModStorage/index.md
